markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Darkseer](/Feats.aspx?ID=950) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 13 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Gloomseer](/Feats.aspx?ID=942)

</column>

---

[Zon-Kuthon](/Deities.aspx?ID=20) smiles upon you—even if you curse his name—granting you pitch-black eyes that allow you to see in shadows and darkness. You gain [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415).
name: Darkseer
